text: Miranda July (born Miranda Jennifer Grossinger; February 15, 1974) is an American movie director, screenwriter, singer, actress and author. She wrote, directed and starred in the movies Me and You and Everyone We Know (2005) and The Future (2011) and wrote and directed Kajillionaire (2020). ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from California Category:Movie producers from California Category:Screenwriters from California Category:Actors from Berkeley, California Category:Singers from Berkeley, California Category:Writers from Berkeley, California Category:American movie actors Category:Writers from Vermont Category:Actors from Vermont Category:Singers from Vermont
title: Miranda July
